title: Eileen Gu: Six Events. Six Medals. Done.
summary: Gu defended her halfpipe gold to become the most decorated freestyle skier in Olympic history.
content:
Eileen Gu just defended her Olympic halfpipe title.

## 6 | Career Olympic medals in six events entered

Six events across two Games. Six medals. **No freestyle skier — man or woman — has ever done this.**

She won gold ahead of compatriot Li Fanghui. Britain's Zoe Atkin took bronze.

>> "Eileen Gu's repeat halfpipe gold makes her the single most decorated freestyle skier in Olympic history." — NBC

She's 22. She competed for China at Beijing 2022 and Milan Cortina 2026. Both times, she was the story.

The closing ceremony is tonight. Gu leaves Italy with her legacy locked: **the greatest freestyle skier the Games have seen.**

!! Perfection across two Olympics. Not a hot streak — a career.
